item.title: About me
item.description: Welcome to my personal site. My name is Fernando Garc√≠a. Most of my professional career has been related to data: data migrations, database administration, business intelligence. And now Big Data and data science.

item.title: First Activity With Carpentries
item.description: A few weeks ago I joined The Carpentries Latin America. The Carpentries is a community whose mission is to teach basic programming and data science skills to researchers around the world.

item.title: First Post
item.description: Finally, I have started this space for technical and creative writing! Thanks to Hugo and this excellent tutorial, I have set it up in record time. Stay tuned!
